1. ![](img/conclude-communicate.png) Define the objective of the experiment and understand the background (Define Objective & Background)    
2. Select appropriate response variables (Select Response)  
3. Identify sources of variation (Determine Sources of Variation)  
4. Choose sampling scheme and/or experimental design (Select Design)  
5. Carry out the study (Do Study) 
6. Statistically analyze the data (Do Statistical Analysis)  
7. Draw conclusions from the analysis while considering limitations and the steps above as well as communicate results (Draw Conclusions & Communicate)
